AuthScheme.description: The type of authentication that the proxy uses for connections from the proxy to the underlying database.
AuthScheme.markdownDescription:
The type of authentication that the proxy uses for connections from the proxy to the underlying database. 

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: SECRETS  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.description: A user-specified description about the authentication used by a proxy to log in as a specific database user.
Description.markdownDescription:
A user-specified description about the authentication used by a proxy to log in as a specific database user. 

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

IAMAuth.description: Whether to require or disallow Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management (IAM) authentication for connections to the proxy. The ENABLED value is valid only for proxies with RDS for Microsoft SQL Server.
IAMAuth.markdownDescription:
Whether to require or disallow Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management (IAM) authentication for connections to the proxy. The ENABLED value is valid only for proxies with RDS for Microsoft SQL Server.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: DISABLED | REQUIRED | ENABLED  
Update requires: No interruption

SecretArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) representing the secret that the proxy uses to authenticate to the RDS DB instance or Aurora DB cluster. These secrets are stored within Amazon Secrets Manager.
SecretArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) representing the secret that the proxy uses to authenticate to the RDS DB instance or Aurora DB cluster. These secrets are stored within Amazon Secrets Manager. 

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

ClientPasswordAuthType.description: The type of authentication the proxy uses for connections from clients.
ClientPasswordAuthType.markdownDescription:
The type of authentication the proxy uses for connections from clients.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: MYSQL_NATIVE_PASSWORD | POSTGRES_SCRAM_SHA_256 | POSTGRES_MD5 | SQL_SERVER_AUTHENTICATION  
Update requires: No interruption

AuthFormat.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: (\w|\d|\s|\\|-|\.:=+-)*  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: (\w|\d|\s|\\|-|\.:=+-)*  
Update requires: No interruption

TagFormat.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Auth.description: The authorization mechanism that the proxy uses.
Auth.markdownDescription:
The authorization mechanism that the proxy uses.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

DBProxyName.description: The identifier for the proxy. This name must be unique for all proxies owned by your AWS account in the specified AWS Region.
DBProxyName.markdownDescription:
The identifier for the proxy. This name must be unique for all proxies owned by your AWS account in the specified AWS Region.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 64  
Pattern: [0-z]*  
Update requires: Replacement

DebugLogging.description: Whether the proxy includes detailed information about SQL statements in its logs.
DebugLogging.markdownDescription:
Whether the proxy includes detailed information about SQL statements in its logs.

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

EngineFamily.description: The kinds of databases that the proxy can connect to.
EngineFamily.markdownDescription:
The kinds of databases that the proxy can connect to.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: MYSQL | POSTGRESQL | SQLSERVER  
Update requires: Replacement

IdleClientTimeout.description: The number of seconds that a connection to the proxy can be inactive before the proxy disconnects it.
IdleClientTimeout.markdownDescription:
The number of seconds that a connection to the proxy can be inactive before the proxy disconnects it.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

RequireTLS.description: A Boolean parameter that specifies whether Transport Layer Security (TLS) encryption is required for connections to the proxy.
RequireTLS.markdownDescription:
A Boolean parameter that specifies whether Transport Layer Security (TLS) encryption is required for connections to the proxy.

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

RoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role that the proxy uses to access secrets in AWS Secrets Manager.
RoleArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role that the proxy uses to access secrets in AWS Secrets Manager.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
An optional set of key-value pairs to associate arbitrary data of your choosing with the proxy.
